title: BONUS: BobbyCast - #230 - Chris Kirkpatrick from NSYNC on The Untold Story of the Band + Will There Ever Be A NSYNC Reunion? + Meeting Michael Jackson
itunes:title: BONUS: BobbyCast - #230 - Chris Kirkpatrick from NSYNC on The Untold Story of the Band + Will There Ever Be A NSYNC Reunion? + Meeting Michael Jackson
description:
Subscribe and Listen to Bobby's Music Podcast: The BobbyCast

Search BobbyCast wherever you're listening to this episode + subscribe!

Chris Kirpatrick from NSYNC stops by to tell the story of how NSYNC formed. We find out about the original members and their early connection to the Backstreet Boys. Chris formed the group and even made a cold call to talent agencies to find a then 14 year-old Justin Timberlake. Chris also talks about growing up poor and now getting to give back to kids like him and if NSYNC will ever reunite with all 5 Members.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
